title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 § 8114.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 § 8114.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 266. The
northbound and southbound roadways of River Road, Route 266, between a point
1000± feet north of the Town of Tonawanda - City of Tonawanda line and
the Town of Tonawanda - City of Buffalo line, in the Town and City of

Tonawanda. (b) US Route 62. The
northbound and southbound roadways of US Route 62, between Route 179 and Miller

Avenue in the Village of Blasdell and Town of Hamburg. (c) Route 277. Route 277 between Route 400
and Route 324 in the Towns of West Seneca, Cheektowaga and Amherst. (d) Colvin Boulevard. The southeastbound
roadway of Colvin Boulevard between Young Street and the eastbound on-ramp of
IR 290 in the City of Tonawanda and the Town of Tonawanda. (e) Colvin Boulevard. The northwestbound
roadway of Colvin Boulevard between the westbound off-ramp of IR 290 and Young

Street in the City of Tonawanda and Town of Tonawanda. (f) Route 93. The northbound and southbound
roadways of Route 93, between Route 5 and Lewis Road in the Town of Newstead
and the Village of Akron. (g) [Eff. until July 15, 1992, see also subd. (g) below.] US Route 219 between the
terminus of US Route 219, the Southern Expressway and the Erie-Cattaraugus
county line, in the Town of Concord and the Village of Springville. (g) [Eff. July 15, 1992, see also subd. (g)
above.] IR 990. IR 990, the Lockport Expressway between IR 290 and Route 283 in
the Town of Amherst. (h) SH 9411. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Walden Avenue, SH 9411, between Dick

Road and Cemetery Road in the Villages of Depew and Lancaster and the Town of

Lancaster. (i) [Eff. until Oct. 16, 1996, see also subd. (i) below.]
Route 265. Route 265 between I-290 and the Niagara-Erie county line and the

Town of Tonawanda-Buffalo city line in the City of Tonawanda, Town of Tonawanda
and Village of Kenmore. (i) [Eff. Oct. 16, 1996 until April 30, 1997, see also subd. (i) above and below.] Route 384. Route 384
between I-290 and the Erie-Niagara county line and the City of Tonawanda and
the Town of Tonawanda. (i) [Eff. April 30, 1997, see also subd. (i) above.] Route 384. Route 384 between the Erie-Niagara county line and the City
of Buffalo-Village of Kenmore line in the Town of Tonawanda and the Village of

Kenmore and the City of Tonawanda. (j) [Eff. until Oct. 16, 1996, see also subd. (j) below.] [
Repealed
]
(j) [Eff. Oct. 16, 1996, see also subd. (j)
above.] Route 425. Route 425 between I-290 and the Erie-Niagara county
line. (k) [Eff. until Oct. 16, 1996, see also subd. (k) below.] Route 16. Route 16 between Route 400, the East

Aurora Expressway, and the Erie-Cattaraugus county line in the Towns of Aurora, Wales, Holland and Sardinia. (k) [Eff. Oct. 16, 1996, see also subd. (k) above.] Route 16. Route 16 between US
Route 20 and the Erie-Cattaraugus county line in the Towns of West Seneca, Elma, Aurora, Holland and Sardinia and the Village of East Aurora. (l) US Route 20A. US Route 20A between US
Route 62 and the Erie-Wyoming county line in the Towns of Hamburg, Orchard

Park, Aurora and Wales, and the Villages of Orchard Park and East

Aurora. (m) The eastbound and
westbound roadways of Route 5 between the Chautauqua-Erie county line and Route
438, in the Town of Brant and the Cattaraugus Indian Reservation. (n) The eastbound and westbound roadways of

Route 438 between Route 5 and a point 300± feet east of Route 5, in the

Town of Brant and the Cattaraugus Indian Reservation. (o) [Eff. until April 30, 1997, see also
subd. (o) below.] Route 62. Route 62 between IR 290 and the Erie-Niagara county
line in the Towns of Amherst and Tonawanda. (o) [Eff. April 30, 1997, see also subd. (o)
above.] US Route 62. US Route 62 between the Erie-Niagara county line and Route
324 in the Towns of Amherst and Tonawanda. (p) [Eff. until April 30, 1997, see also
subd. (p) below.] Route 39. Route 39 between Route 219, the Southern

Expressway, and Route 62 in the Towns of Concord and Collins. (p) [Eff. April 30, 1997, see also subd. (p)
above.] Route 39. Route 39 between US Route 62 and Route 16 in the Towns of

Concord, Collins and Sardinia, and the Village of Springville. (q) [Eff. until April 30, 1997, see also
subd. (q) below.] Route 62. Route 62 between Route 39 and the Erie-Cattaraugus
county line in the Town of Collins and Village of Gowanda. (q) [Eff. April 30, 1997, see also subd. (q)
above.] US Route 62. US Route 62 between the Erie-Cattaraugus county line and

Ridge Road in the Town of Collins, North Collins, Eden and Hamburg, and the

Villages of Gowanda, North Collins, Hamburg and Blasdell, and the City of

Lackawanna. (r) [Eff. until Jan. 29, 1992, see also subd. (r) below.] Route 78. Route 78, Transit Road, between
exit 49 of IR 90 and Wehrle Drive in the Towns of Lancaster, Cheektowaga, Amherst and Clarence. (r) [Eff. Jan. 29, 1992, see also subd. (r) above.] Route 78. Route 78, Transit Road, between Strasmer Road and the Erie-Niagara county line in the Towns of

Lancaster, Cheektowaga, Amherst and Clarence and the Village of

Depew. (s) [Eff. until Dec. 4, 1991, see also subd. (s) below.] Route 5. Route 5 between Route 179 and the

Lackawanna-Buffalo city line, in the Town of Hamburg and City of

Lackawanna. (s) [Eff. Dec. 4, 1991
until May 27, 1992, see also subd. (s) above and below.] Route 5. Route 5
between Route 179 and the Ohio Street in the Town of Hamburg, City of

Lackawanna, and the City of Buffalo. (s) [Eff. May 27, 1992 until Sept. 2, 1998, see also subd. (s) above and below.] Route 5. Route 5 between IR 190 and Route
179 in the Town of Hamburg, City of Lackawanna, and the City of

Buffalo. (s) [Eff. Sept. 2, 1998, see also subd. (s) above.] Route 5. Route 5 between Route 179 and I-190, in the

Cities of Lackawanna and Buffalo, and the Town of Hamburg. (t) Dick Road. Dick Road between Walden

Avenue (SH 9411) and George Urban Boulevard in the Town of Cheektowaga and

Village of Depew. (u) Lake Avenue. Lake Avenue between Route 5 and a point 3,000± feet east of Route 5; provided, however, that this route is designated as an access highway for use
by tandem trailer combinations and vehicles up to 102 inches in width
only. (v) [Eff. until July 15, 1992, see also subd. (v) below.] Route 384. Route 384, Delaware Avenue, between
the I-290, Youngmann Expressway and the Town of Tonawanda-Kenmore village line
in the Town of Tonawanda. (v) [Eff. July 15, 1992, see also subd. (v) above.] Route 78. Route 78 (Transit Road)
between Route 400, the Aurora Expressway and CR 215 (Seneca Street). (w) [Eff. until June 22, 1994, see also subd. (w) below.] Route 384. Route 384, Delaware Avenue, between Route 198, Scajaquada Expressway and the Village of Kenmore-Buffalo city line in the City
of Buffalo. (w) [Eff. June 22, 1994, see also subd. (w) above.] US Route 20. US Route 20 between Route 130 and
the Erie-Genesee county line in the Towns of Lancaster and Alden and the

Villages of Depew, Lancaster and Alden. (y) US Route 20. US Route 20 between Route 75
and the Erie-Chautauqua county line in the Towns of Hamburg, Evans and

Brant. (z) Route 324. Route 324
between I-190 and Route 5 in the Towns of Tonawanda, Amherst and

Clarence. (aa)

Route 179 (Milestrip

Road). Route 179 between I-90 and US Route 20 in the Towns of Orchard Park and

Hamburg. (ab)

Route 240. Route 240
between Walden Avenue (Route 952Q) and Route 277 in the Towns of Cheektowaga, West Seneca and Orchard Park. (ac)
US Route 20. US Route 20 between Howard Road and the Erie-Genesee county line
in the Towns of Hamburg, Orchard Park, West Seneca, Elma, Lancaster and Alden, and the Village of Alden. (ad)
CR
207 (William Street). CR 207 between US Route 62 and Route 240 in the Town of

Cheektowaga and the City of Buffalo. (ae)

Ridge Road. Ridge Road between I-90 and

Route 5 in the City of Lackawanna and the Town of West Seneca. (af)
CR 335 (Townline Road). CR 335 between
US Route 20 and Route 354 in the Towns of Lancaster, Alden, Elma and

Marilla. (ag)

Route 354. Route 354
between the Erie-Wyoming county line and US Route 62 in the Towns of

Cheektowaga, West Seneca, Elma and Marilla, and the City of Buffalo. (ah)
CR 32 (Eden-Evans Center Road). CR 32
between US Route 20 and US Route 62 in the Towns of Evans and Eden. (ai)

Dingens Street. Dingens Street between
US Route 62 and Route 240 in the City of Buffalo and the Town of

Cheektowaga. (aj)

Route 5. Route 5
between the Erie-Genesee county line and I-290 in the Towns of Newstead, Clarence and Amherst, and the Village of Williamsville. (ak)

Route 5. Route 5 between the

Erie-Chautauqua county line and Route 75 in the Towns of Brant, Evans and

Hamburg, and the Cattaraugus Indian Reservation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
§
8114.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
